# Calculation - Bug IBI

Example of IBI metric information for macroinvertebrate assemblages in
low-gradient streams (glide-pool habitat) (Table E3 from Bug Protocols & IBI; 
MPCA 2017).

To see IBI metric information for all macroinvertebrate classes, see MPCA 2017
[<a href="https://github.com/leppott/MNcalc/raw/main/inst/apps/MNcalc/www/links/BugIBI_2017_MetricInformation.pdf" target="blank">PDF</a>] and the output file
‘IBI_3metrules.’
